original_title: 神さま、わたしの鉄道をまもって。～三木の紅龍伝説～
overview: Mikina, the daughter of the shrine priest, has dreamed of becoming a train driver since childhood. But when the station is completely destroyed in a fire, the future for the little-used railway in the region is on the line.
title: God, Protect My Railroad. ～ Legend of Miki's Red Dragon ～
